attributes.action: make all housing in the uk energy efficent and designed to have the least environmental impact possible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
please sign this petition if you want to see a brighter future for britian

all housing in the uk should have plenty of countryside,parkland, woodland nearby and plenty of open spaces with trees in and around housing estates

this is not the case nowhere days as housing estates are so packed together their is little room for wildlife

leaving space for wildlife is great as it allows them to thrive along with us
it would also benifet us humans as well as children would be more aware of natural britian and healthier

our goverment should take the right steps in ensuring that housing is built with the environment in mind
